participant_detail.text: We interviewed industry researchers with academic training, who shared how they have used academic research to inform their work.
In the second interview stage, we broadened recruiting criteria and interviewed 37 participants engaged in HCI-related research and practice fields.
We also interviewed science communicators and communication managers.
We iterated on the model after each interview.
Second, we interviewed academic researchers, design practitioners and students, entrepreneurs, and science communicators.
We met with him and he prototyped a version that we had in mind.
See detailed participant information on Table 1, and in Supplementary materials.
Second, at the bottom, we show participant experience in the HCI field.
